titleStmt.title: An exact and true account of the proceedings of the sessions begun at the Old-Bayly, on Wednesday January the 17th. 1682. Giving an account of the tryals and condemnations of the several prisoners brought thither. Printed by authority.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (London)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Croom, in Thames-street, over against Baynard's Castle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
